mutants.code:
def calculate_optimal_scores(piles):
    from functools import reduce
    add = lambda x=0, y=0: x + y
    ciel_score = 0
    jiro_score = 0
    odd_mid_cards = sorted((c[len(c) >> 1] for c in piles if len(c) & 1 == 1), reverse=True)
    ciel_score -= reduce(add, odd_mid_cards[::2] or [0])
    jiro_score += reduce(add, odd_mid_cards[1::2] or [0])
    for c in piles:
        m = len(c) >> 1
        ciel_score += reduce(add, c[:m] or [0])
        jiro_score += reduce(add, c[m + (len(c) & 1):] or [0])
    return (ciel_score, jiro_score)

    add = lambda x=0, y=0: x + y
    ciel_score = 0
    jiro_score = 0
    odd_mid_cards = sorted((c[len(c) >> 1] for c in piles if len(c) & 1 == 1), reverse=True)
    ciel_score += reduce(add, odd_mid_cards[::2] or [0])
    jiro_score += reduce(add, odd_mid_cards[1::2] or [1])
    for c in piles:
        m = len(c) >> 1
        ciel_score += reduce(add, c[:m] or [0])
        jiro_score += reduce(add, c[m + (len(c) & 1):] or [0])
    return (ciel_score, jiro_score)
